title: Level 0 to Level 1 Honor
body: I've been playing about 5 games a day for 4 months since my "locked honor" had been unlocked and i was just wondering how much longer will i be in level 0?

replies.body: It looks like there have been some chat logs with borderline toxic behavior that might be holding your progress back slightly. We don't usually want players personal chat logs out here in the open where others could possibly attack you for what was said, but you're always welcome to reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to talk about what's holding your progress back.

I usually only play 5 lock would this effect my progress? I'm pretty sure I'm not toxic it was just that 1 word i said (which was a joke) that got me a 2 week ban and next penalty is perma banned even though I've only ever had 1 chat restriction which was at least a year before the 2 week ban
how did u get it locked in the first place?
that new star guardian ezreal skin came out and i said he looks like a *3 letter F word*
